entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle this evening. A few rain showers beginning near midnight then changing to 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle before morning. Fog patches. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 near midnight then light overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
